To new fans, welcome! Our fandom is called Monbebe.   Monsta X consists of seven members. They are : Shownu, Wonho, Minhyuk, Kihyun, Hyungwon, Jooheon, I.M.   Monsta X was formed from a survival show called No Mercy. They debuted on 14th May 2015, under Starship Entertainment.   0:05  1:01  1:20  3:07   Shownu - He is the leader of the group. His name is Sohn Hyunwoo. His position in the group is main dancer, along with being lead vocal. He is the oldest member. He is called Papa Bear by his fans. You can distinguish him by his tall, muscled appearance.   0:49  2:01  2:38  3:00   Wonho - He likes exercising. His name is Lee Hoseok. His position in the group is lead vocal, along with being lead dancer. He likes to eat, and absolutely loves ramen. He always calls himself handsome, wherever he goes. You can distinguish him by his muscled appearance, along with his squared chin.   0:55  2:06  2:15  2:52   Minhyuk - He is the mood-maker of the group. His name is Lee Minhyuk. His position in the group is vocalist, along with being a visual. He is known as the person who takes the most selfies. He is known to be the loudest member. You can distinguish him by his thin face.   1:13  2:24  3:11  3:19   Kihyun - He is known as the mother of the group. His name is Yoo Kihyun. His position in the group is main vocal. He is referred to as hamster by his fans. He nags a lot at his members. You can distinguish him by his short appearance.   1:08  1:39  2:18  2:50   Hyungwon - He is known to have thick lips. His name is Chae Hyungwon. His position in the group is lead dancer, along with being vocalist and visual. He is known to be the member who sleeps a lot. He was formerly a model. You can distinguish him by his tall appearance, and his thick lips.   0:03  0:26  1:55  2:34   Jooheon - He is famous for his fast and intense rap. His name is Lee Jooheon. His position in the group is main rapper. He is an aegyo(display of affection) king. He is the member who easily gets scared. You can distinguish him by his broad face.   0:38  1:49  2:13  2:22   I.M - He is the youngest member in the group. His name is Im Changkyun. His position in the group is lead rapper. He is famous for his deep voice, contrary to his face. He loves memes, and is trendy. You can distinguish him by his small face.   You can watch their interviews to distinguish them. I suggest Weekly Idol. You can watch No Mercy to get to know them better as well.

Alright, I have a theory about who is which deadly sin. I took some time to do my research on the sins and I watched the MV about ten times until I came to a conclusion. Here it goes:  Pride - obsesseion with a false and twisted image of oneself, fake greatness. This is Hyungwon. He is sitting on a throne, looking all pretty. He believes he is higher than everyone else. Greed - longing for material gain, people who suffer from greed are usually manipulators, thiefs and are mostly violent. This is Jooheon. He appears to be very violent and greedy to come out of that cage. He has handcuffs on his hand and that thing over his mouth which indicates that someone stopped him from taking too much. Lust - an intense want for an object or action (sex, power, money...). This is Wonho. He is in a cage meaning he cannot get what he wants and the smoke indicates he is very intense about it. Also him standing in an empty theater means he is lusting for power that he will never really get. Envy - wanting something that one does not have whether it be in the form of achivement or material possesion. This is I.M because we see him burn that card and also he is peeping through the blinds, watching something. Gluttony - over-consumption of food, drink or wealth. This is Minhyuk. He can't stop touching the thorns and eventually they hurt him and make him bleed just like food makes people fat for example. Wrath - intense expression of emotion with hostile responses to provocations. This is Shownu. We can see him holding the wrath card with the match and he was lightning that match previously. Sloth - this is hard to define. Usually it is the feeling of indifference towards the world and avoiding obligations. This is Kihyun because we see him in a room full of manequins and that means he is indifferent towards people. And also he is standing at the bottom of the stairs meaning he is lazy to climb them.  Also we see groupations: Hyungwon with I.M (Pride with envy). Prideful people are usually very fragile and they are secretly envious of others. Jooheon, Wonho and Shownu (Greed, lust and wrath) Lust and greed bring anger. Minhyuk and Kihyun (Sloth and gluttony). If we are obsessed over something we will probably start being lazy over other stuff.  Also we see how some of them reedem themselves. Kihyun walking up the stairs, I.M burning the envy card, Hyungwon lowering his head in shame while sitting on the couch, Shownu becoming aware of his anger, Wonho dancing in the empty theatre focused on himself... I'm just not sure about Jooheon and Minhyuk.
Couldn't be more prouder than this.

I see a lot of comments complaining about BTS. Now, I understand that this is a Monsta X video, but if you're going to say don't talk about BTS and then put BTS into your own comments, I have like no idea what you want? Like can't you just comment something about the MV instead of complaining about a different group? In addition, with the top comments where there are people arguing about the eap line, everyone is pointing out BTS and ARMY, when no one else is talking about other comments stating other groups,are also better. You just single out BTS and ARMY. Don't attack me, I'm just trying to point out what I've seen. The complaints of plagarism accusations of BTS is something I haven't heard of - yet you claim that RM amd ARMY should apologize for what - releasing a MV on the same day? Never knew it was a crime. Just enjoy the MV, instead of singling out a group and trying to mow them down. Hopefully most Monsta X fans are mature enough to stay unbothered and focus on streaming. Also, please don't reply because I don't want to engage in a fan war, I am simply just stating what I have seen.

I see people saying it's like fake love but??? Im an army but i don't see the resemblance at all. Tbh my first thoughts were 'wow this is so cool' and 'is it an apocalypse concept?' and not 'this sounds/ looks like fake love'. It doesnt? Idk, maybe im just really dumb about picking up pitches and all that. But at least as a piano and dance student, i can tell you that the structure of the songs are quite different, and when compared, shoot out and fake love have different feels, you know? Different textures. Fake Love gives you a sense of loss and betrayal, and while Shoot Out does portray a certain amount of loss, its not nearly as much as Fake Love. Rather, Shoot Out gives you the notion of fighting back, of struggle. So um yeah, i dont think theyre alike at all, but everyone is entitled to their own opinion.

And now, for my Thesis/Dissertation on MonstaX's comeback:  1. The song fits their vocal ranges really well. It's not like random whispering for Hyungwon or a weird falsetto for Minhyuk. The two of them especially finally REALLY fit their parts.  2. I feel like Wonho really popped with his vocals for the first time since stuck. Like in Jealousy he really strained but I think this song will really work for him. I can feel it!  3. Shownu and freaking KIHYUN dancing that chorus was so good. Like obviously Shownu is really good but Kihyun fucking OWNED that dance even tho he wasn't center for long 4. SHOWNU FINALLY HAS GOOD HAIR. It's been kinda weird since like All In Era. His looks are poppin and just all the members have been styled super well. Also, Wonho's blond is SUCH a win. I'm psyched for the photobook of the album kjashlkjhfd. 5. Finally, the moment you've all been waiting for.  R A P L I N E. They snapped even harder than like Dramarama and Jealousy? Like how? Tbh I usually like Jooheon's raps more than I.M's but this time I think it's the other way. Like Jooheon was INSANE but I.M broke this whole new level of style? Like Jooheon was always super distinct with his style and I think I.M finally locked into it. It's one of my favorite raps of his. IT'S FUCKING ON F I R E 6. Last but certainly not least. MY BIAS. HYUNGWON. Omg his mini dance-break K I L L E D me and just everything about his aesthetic is too beautiful to handle (haha get it?). ANYWAYS. I loved his parts so much and just him and ugh I'm in love so send help  CONCLUSION: STAN MONSTAX YA HOES

My very first reaction:  - absolutely love the chorus and vocal parts - not too sure about the rap parts, especially jooheons, simply because it's something I'm not used to, but it will probably only take a few more listens and I'm hooked - the choreography is absolutely gorgeous! I really love the key point! Maybe it's supposed to illustrate the backlash of a gun while being fired? - the cinematography is amazing! It looks so pretty and aesthetically pleasing!! It still amazes me how they can film all these dark scenes without the camera failing.. the way the fire is portrayed is also her well done. - don't even get me started on the outfits!!!! They look absolutely gorgeous! The makeup and hairstylist is really good too! They're going for a very dark, but also mysterious concept, which world tremendously well with the not too masculine outfits! - all in all: absolutely amazing and I can't wait for the live performances of this and the full choreo!
